name: Greengar Studios
tag_list: iphone, ios, ipod-touch, apps, app-store, android, mobile
overview:
Simple · Fun · Useful

These three words succinctly describe the mobile apps we create here at GreenGar Studios.

Greengar was recently founded by two University of Southern California alumni. From games to productivity, our interests span a range of categories with broad appeal. We’ve successfully released about a dozen simple, fun, and useful apps for the iOS, Mac and Android platforms. Our most popular are Whiteboard: Collaborative Drawing and Brain Tuner. After three years of hard work, we surpassed 12 million downloads in Jun 2012. Greengar apps are among the most popular on the Apple App Store.

Greengar is a fast-paced international startup company with team members in Ho Chi Minh City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. Our users are all over the world, from the U.S. to the U.K. and beyond.
